statements: SELECT * FROM shareholder_voting_records ORDER BY voting_id ASC;
SELECT shareholder_name, resolution FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE vote_decision = 'FOR';
SELECT voting_date, vote_decision FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE shareholder_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY voting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE voting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT shareholder_name FROM shareholder_voting_records ORDER BY shareholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE voting_id = 1;
SELECT shareholder_name, resolution FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE vote_decision = 'FOR';
SELECT * FROM shareholder_voting_records ORDER BY voting_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE voting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT shareholder_name, resolution, vote_decision FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE vote_decision = 'ABSTAIN' ORDER BY shareholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shareholder_voting_records;
SELECT voter_id, shareholder_name FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE vote_decision = 'Yes';
SELECT voter_id, shareholder_name, vote_timestamp FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE vote_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM board_members ORDER BY member_name ASC, tenure_years DESC;
SELECT member_name, position FROM board_members WHERE tenure_years >= 5;
SELECT voter_id, shareholder_name, vote_decision, vote_timestamp FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT voter_id, shareholder_name, vote_decision, vote_timestamp FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE vote_decision = 'Yes';
SELECT voter_id, shareholder_name, vote_decision, vote_timestamp FROM shareholder_voting_records ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_id, shareholder_name, vote_decision, vote_timestamp FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE shareholder_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND vote_decision = 'No';
SELECT member_id, member_name, position, tenure_years FROM board_members WHERE position = 'President';
SELECT * FROM shareholder_voting_records;
SELECT shareholder_id, vote_option FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE vote_option='Yes';
SELECT shareholder_id, COUNT(voting_id) AS total_votes FROM shareholder_voting_records GROUP BY shareholder_id;
SELECT voting_id, vote_option FROM shareholder_voting_records ORDER BY voting_id DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, email FROM shareholders WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM shareholder_voting_records ORDER BY voting_id DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, vote_option FROM shareholders JOIN shareholder_voting_records ON shareholders.shareholder_id = shareholder_voting_records.shareholder_id WHERE vote_option = 'Yes';
SELECT vote_option, COUNT(*) AS vote_count FROM shareholder_voting_records GROUP BY vote_option ORDER BY vote_count DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, email, phone_number FROM shareholders WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT voting_id, vote_option, MAX(vote_timestamp) AS latest_vote_timestamp FROM shareholder_voting_records GROUP BY voting_id, vote_option ORDER BY latest_vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM shareholder_votes WHERE vote_decision = 'Yes';
SELECT shareholder_name, resolution FROM shareholder_votes WHERE meeting_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT meeting_location, meeting_date FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT resolution_text FROM resolutions WHERE decision_result = 'Approved';
SELECT shareholder_name, email, phone_number FROM shareholders WHERE shareholder_id = 3;
SELECT shareholder_name, vote_decision FROM shareholder_votes WHERE resolution='Approval'
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_location='New York' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC
SELECT shareholder_name, email FROM shareholders WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%'
SELECT shareholder_name, vote_decision, r.resolution_text FROM shareholder_votes v INNER JOIN resolutions r ON v.resolution = r.resolution_text
SELECT * FROM shareholder_votes WHERE vote_decision='Against' ORDER BY meeting_date
SELECT * FROM shareholder_voting_records;
SELECT shareholder_id, vote, timestamp FROM shareholder_voting_records;
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_id, agenda FROM meetings;
SELECT * FROM voting_results WHERE pass = TRUE;
SELECT name, email FROM shareholders WHERE shareholder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM shareholder_voting_records WHERE vote > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT s.name, s.email, m.agenda FROM shareholders s JOIN meetings m ON s.shareholder_id = m.meeting_id;
SELECT v.result_id, v.meeting_id, v.vote, vo.description FROM voting_results v JOIN voting_options vo ON v.result_id = vo.option_id WHERE pass = TRUE;

SELECT s.name, m.outcome, vr.vote FROM shareholders s JOIN meetings m ON s.shareholder_id = m.meeting_id JOIN voting_results vr ON m.meeting_id = vr.meeting_id WHERE vr.vote < 0.5 ORDER BY s.name ASC;
SELECT s.name, s.address, vr.pass FROM shareholders s JOIN voting_results vr ON s.shareholder_id = vr.meeting_id;
